content: to this section at end of round create 1 popcorn in next space 2 popcorn in next space 1 popcorn in next space 2 popcorn in next space etc finish round 2 by adding 1 popcorn in the space where the 1st popcorn was made join with a slip_stitch into the bottom chain 3 of the 1st popcorn of this r nd 18 popcorn in total round 4 the pattern of this round is 1 popcorn in next space 1 popcorn in next space 2 popcorn in next space around this still means you start each very first popcorn with chain 3 as before though there will be only 1 popcorn in the very first space 24 popcorn in total change to color d round 5 6 & 7 1 popcorn in each space all around 24 popcorn each round round 8 decrease 3 popcorn in this round by skipping the 4th 12th & 20th space you do insert the hook and pull the yarn t hrough in the space you are skipping and then create the popcorn in the next space 21 popcorn in total sew in loose ends you might also sew the beginning of each round a bit together if the openings are a bit b igger there so the spacing is the same all around w ash in the washing machine for one hour after washing let dry and form the coaster with your hands in the desired shape enjoy your cozy coaster if you have any questions or suggestions contact me at celloknits@gmail com
